entry.def: A goalkeeper is the player in a sports team whose job is to guard the goal.

means.word_mean: 1. the soccer or hockey player assigned to protect the goal
2. the defensive position on an ice hockey or soccer or lacrosse team who stands in front of the goal and tries to prevent opposing players from scoring
